Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your inquiry regarding funding through Pak Mail’s partnership with RapidAdvance.
I wanted to email you to introduce myself. My name is {!Lead.OwnerFullName}, and I will be your dedicated Account Executive throughout the entire financing process. I will be able to build you customized quotes and help you select the program that best meets your needs, as well as act as your main point of contact while you receive your funding. This keeps the process seamless, simple and efficient.
RapidAdvance is part of a family of over 60 companies, which include Quicken Loans, the Cleveland Cavaliers, and many other products and services that you may be familiar with – we all share a common belief that providing amazing customer service is what differentiates us from other options you have.
RapidAdvance has provided approximately $600,000,000 to businesses of all sizes, in all areas of the country.
I will be contacting you shortly to work up a free, no obligation quote.
If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to call me at {!Lead.OwnerPhone} or email me at {!Lead.OwnerEmail}.
I look forward to working with you.
Warm regards,
{!Lead.OwnerFirstName}
